section1.title: About LEAP Exhibition
section1.subtitle: The largest technology platform in the region... where ideas are made and the future is born.
section1.description: LEAP is a turning point in the global tech scene, offering deep insights into the digital future.

section2.title: SDM's Role in LEAP Coverage
section2.subtitle: We capture the essence of the event... moments of awe, inspiring stories, and technologies worth telling.
section2.description: SDM's mission was to transform the physical experience of the exhibition into impactful digital visual content.

section1.title: Public Investment Fund
section1.subtitle: The largest investment arm in the Kingdom
section1.description: The largest investment arm in the Kingdom and a key driver of Vision 2030. Giant projects, international investments, and an economic impact that expands every year.

section2.title: SDM
section2.subtitle: Translating the language of numbers into stories
section2.description: Translating the language of numbers into stories... and showcasing the impact of projects from a human and visual perspective that brings the picture closer to the audience.

section1.title: Hajj and Umrah Conference & Exhibition
section1.subtitle: A platform showcasing everything that facilitates the journey of the pilgrims
section1.description: A platform showcasing everything that facilitates the journey of the pilgrims: technologies, solutions, and services presented in the spirit of the Kingdom. An event that brings together experts from around the world to develop the greatest religious experience.

section2.title: SDM
section2.subtitle: Highlighting the beauty of the organization
section2.description: Highlighting the beauty of the organization... and telling the guest's story from the moment they enter the hall until the last smile they bid farewell to the event with.

section1.title: Social Responsibility Forum
section1.subtitle: A forum celebrating impact
section1.description: A forum celebrating impact... actions that change people's lives, and initiatives that build a stronger society.

section2.title: SDM
section2.subtitle: We showcase human stories before numbers
section2.description: We showcase human stories before numbers, documenting initiatives worthy of being seen and visually immortalized.

section1.title: The Financial Conference
section1.subtitle: Where financial and investment leaders meet
section1.description: Where financial and investment leaders meet.... discussions, trends, and visions that shape the future of the Saudi economy.

section2.title: SDM
section2.subtitle: Transforming the language of economics into easy content
section2.description: Transforming the language of economics into easy, visual, and attractive content... touching the audience and explaining the stories behind financial decisions.

section1.title: Tourism Forum
section1.subtitle: A platform bringing together tourism leaders and trip makers
section1.description: A platform bringing together tourism leaders and trip makers… Here, visions that shape the future of Saudi tourism are presented, and experiences that make visitors see the Kingdom through different eyes are showcased. Events, sessions, new destinations… all contribute to creating a global tourism sector that competes with its authenticity and uniqueness.

section2.title: SDM
section2.subtitle: We capture moments that inspire
section2.description: We capture moments that inspire… We photograph the stories behind destinations and the ideas that redefine tourism. We visually produce the event in a way that befits the spirit of exploration…
